meanings.definition: A person who convenes or organizes a meeting or event.
meanings.sent1: The convenor of the book club scheduled the next meeting.
meanings.sent2: The school principal acted as the convenor for the assembly.
meanings.sent3: The convenor of the picnic forgot to bring the snacks!
meanings.sent4: She was the convenor of harmony among her friends.
meanings.sent5: The convenor's role is crucial for a successful event.

meanings.definition: An individual who brings people together for a specific purpose.
meanings.sent1: As the convenor of the charity drive, he motivated everyone to participate.
meanings.sent2: The team captain served as the convenor for the team-building exercise.
meanings.sent3: The convenor of the surprise party kept the secret well hidden.
meanings.sent4: She was the convenor of joy in their lives.
meanings.sent5: The convenor's enthusiasm inspired others to join the cause.
